page.title: 16WORK OF PARISH COUNCIL (1)
page.content: The Parish Council meets regularly. Its members are people interested in village matters.They discuss all sorts of problems affecting the village and help community groups by providing money and equipment for projects. Young people,working for the 'Community Programme' have erected new fencing throughout the village and landscaped the area adgacent to the church with stone setts,grass and flower beds. Hundreds of bulbs have been planted to provide a colourful display in spring. In July a clean_up campaign was organised to collect litter and generally improve the appearance of the village. This was very succesful and may become an annual event.
